title: 'Like We Were Talking in Person': Zuckerberg’s Metaverse Is Coming to Life
description: Mark Zuckerberg and Lex Fridman did a podcast on AI entirely in the metaverse—and we’ve come a long way from Meta’s legless avatars.

title: SEC launches proceedings to determine fate of spot Bitcoin ETFs, invites public comment
description:
The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) submitted several filings on Sept. 28 that concern pending spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs). Those filings act as orders that institute proceedings through which the SEC will determine whether to approve or reject proposed rule changes. If these rule changes are approved, it could pave the way for […]

The post SEC launches proceedings to determine fate of spot Bitcoin ETFs, invites public comment appeared first on CryptoSlate.
